channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-17722] Metrics subsystem stop/start messages add a lot of useless bulk to operational logging
item.description:
Metrics subsystem stop/start messages add a lot of useless bulk to operational logging. Say you are collecting logs from a fleet of thousands of servers and want to have them around for ~month or longer. It adds up.

I think these should at least be at DEBUG level and ideally at TRACE. They don't offer much utility. Unfortunately they are Hadoop classes so we can tweak log4j.properties defaults instead. We do this in test resources but not in what we ship in conf/ . 

<time> INFO  [<thread>] impl.MetricsSystemImpl: HBase metrics system started

<time> INFO  [<thread>] impl.MetricsSystemImpl: Stopping HBase metrics system...

<time> INFO  [<thread>] impl.MetricsSystemImpl: HBase metrics system stopped.

<time> INFO  [<thread>] impl.MetricsConfig: loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2-hbase.properties

<time> INFO  [<thread>] impl.MetricsSystemImpl: Scheduled snapshot period at 10 second(s).
item.summary: Metrics subsystem stop/start messages add a lot of useless bulk to operational logging

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: This should just be an update to log4.properties settings. Just a sec.

I too noticed these messages showing up in recent version of 1.2.x

2017-02-27 17:21:00,974 INFO  [HBase-Metrics2-1] impl.MetricsSinkAdapter: Sink timeline started
2017-02-27 17:21:00,976 INFO  [HBase-Metrics2-1] impl.MetricsSystemImpl: Scheduled snapshot period at 10 second(s).
2017-02-27 17:21:00,976 INFO  [HBase-Metrics2-1] impl.MetricsSystemImpl: HBase metrics system started

2017-02-27 17:36:00,449 INFO  [HBase-Metrics2-1] impl.MetricsSystemImpl: Stopping HBase metrics system...
2017-02-27 17:36:00,450 INFO  [timeline] impl.MetricsSinkAdapter: timeline thread interrupted.
2017-02-27 17:36:00,455 INFO  [HBase-Metrics2-1] impl.MetricsSystemImpl: HBase metrics system stopped.

Do you want to add impl.MetricsSinkAdapter? Do you want to put it as 'WARN'?
Otherwise +1
+1 on setting those lower, they are annoying as heck. We should ideally vet log output changes while reviewing patches, so as to not even have to do this afterwards, like now?

-1 overall

+1

We should ideally vet log output changes while reviewing patches, so as to not even have to do this afterwards, like now?

This is something I look at when doing reviews. Happy to see an increase in others doing it as well. Maybe worth a push on HBASE-12396 if other folks are interested?
Attaching what I committed, with jerryhe's suggested changes
